Function.Name: AddControlEffect
Function.Description: Adds the control effect given by type to the spells targets or the given target spawn

Function.Name: AddConversationOption
Function.Description: Adds an option to the given conversation, function is the callback if this option is selected

Function.Name: AddHate
Function.Description: Adds The given amount of hate for the Attacker to the Target

Function.Name: AddImmunitySpell
Function.Description: Adds an immunity of the given type to the spells targets, or just the given target

Function.Name: AddLanguage
Function.Description: Adds the language to the player

Function.Name: AddLootCoin
Function.Description: Sets the given NPC's coin loot to the given value

Function.Name: AddLootItem
Function.Description: Adds the given amount of the given item to the NPC's loot

Function.Name: AddMultiFloorLift
Function.Description: Sets the widget as a multi floor lift

Function.Name: AddOptionWindowOption
Function.Description: Adds an option to the option window

Function.Name: AddPrimaryEntityCommand
Function.Description: Adds an entity command to the given spawn for the given player

Function.Name: AddProc
Function.Description: Adds a proc to the given entity with the given chance to go off

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqClass
Function.Description: Sets the given class as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqFaction
Function.Description: Sets the given faction range as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqItem
Function.Description: Sets the given item as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqModelType
Function.Description: Sets the given model type as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqQuest
Function.Description: Sets the given quest ID as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqRace
Function.Description: Sets the given race as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqTradeskillClass
Function.Description: Sets the given trade skill class as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestPrereqTradeskillLevel
Function.Description: Sets the given trade skill level as a prerequisite for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestRewardCoin
Function.Description: Adds the given coins as a reward for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestRewardFaction
Function.Description: Adds the given amount of the given faction as a reward for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestRewardItem
Function.Description: Adds the given item as a reward for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestSelectableRewardItem
Function.Description: Adds the given item as a selectable reward for the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestStep
Function.Description: Adds a step to the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestStepChat
Function.Description: Adds a chat step for the given NPC's (can provide more then one) to the given quest

Function.Name: AddQuestStepCompleteAction
Function.Description: Sets a callback function for when the step is completed

Function.Name: AddQuestStepCraft
Function.Description: Adds a crafting step to the given quest, only crafting the given items (can provide more then one) will count

Function.Name: AddQuestStepHarvest
Function.Description: Adds a harvesting step to the given quest, can provide more then one item ID

Function.Name: AddQuestStepKill
Function.Description: Adds a kill step to the given quest, can provide more then one NPC ID

Function.Name: AddQuestStepLocation
Function.Description: Adds a location step to the given quest, can provide multiple x, y, z params

Function.Name: AddQuestStepObtainItem
Function.Description: Adds an obtain item step to the given quest, can provide multiple item IDs

Function.Name: AddQuestStepProgressAction
Function.Description: Adds a call back function for when progress is made on the step

Function.Name: AddQuestStepSpell
Function.Description: Adds a spell step to the given quest, can provide multiple spell IDs

Function.Name: AddSkillBonus
Function.Description: Adds a skill bonus to the spells targets

Function.Name: AddSpawnAccess
Function.Description: Allows the given spawn to see the private spawn

Function.Name: AddSpawnIDAccess
Function.Description: Allows the spawn to see the private spawn in the given zone with the given ID

Function.Name: AddSpawnSpellBonus
Function.Description: Adds a bonus to the given spawn

Function.Name: AddSpellBonus
Function.Description: Adds a bonus to the spells targets

Function.Name: AddSpellBookEntry
Function.Description: Gives the spell to the player

Function.Name: AddSpellTimer
Function.Description: Sets a callback function to trigger after the given time (in milliseconds)

Function.Name: AddStepProgress
Function.Description: Adds progress to the given quest step for the given player

Function.Name: AddThreatTransfer
Function.Description: Adds a threat transfer on the target for the caster

Function.Name: AddTimer
Function.Description: Adds a timer to the target spawn

Function.Name: AddToWard
Function.Description: Adds the given amount to the ward, only usable in spell scripts

Function.Name: AddTransportSpawn
Function.Description: Sets the given spawn as a transport spawn

Function.Name: AddWard
Function.Description: Adds a ward with the given amount to the spells targets. Allows you to set if the ward is to be kept after it is depleted (defulat is true), the type of ward, and if the type is magical the damage types to absorb. Can only be used in spell scripts

Function.Name: ApplySpellVisual
Function.Description: Applys the spell visual to the given spawn

Function.Name: Attack
Function.Description: Forces the NPC to attack the Player

Function.Name: Bind
Function.Description: Sets the players bind location to their current location

Function.Name: BlurVision
Function.Description: Blurs the vision of the spells targets or the provided target

Function.Name: BreatheUnderwater
Function.Description: Sets weather the spells targets, or provided target, can breathe underwater

Function.Name: CancelSpell
Function.Description: Cancels the spell, can only be used in a spell script

Function.Name: CanHarvest
Function.Description: Checks to see if the player can harvest the ground spawn

Function.Name: CanReceiveQuest
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Player can get the quest

Function.Name: CastEntityCommand
Function.Description: Has the Player cast the given entity command on the provided target

Function.Name: CastSpell
Function.Description: Caste the given spell on the target, if caster is left out then target will be the caster

Function.Name: Charm
Function.Description: Has the Entity charm the NPC, must be used in a spell script

Function.Name: CheckRaceType
Function.Description: Checks to see if the given spawn is the race id

Function.Name: ClearEncounter
Function.Description: Clears the encounter for the provided spawn

Function.Name: ClearHate
Function.Description: Clears the hate list for the provided NPC, is a spawn is provided then only remove that spawn from the hate list

Function.Name: CloseConversation
Function.Description: Closes the conversation between the Player and Spawn

Function.Name: CloseItemConversation
Function.Description: Closes the conversation between the Player and Item

Function.Name: CompareSpawns
Function.Description: Compares the spawns to see if they are the same

Function.Name: CopySpawnAppearance
Function.Description: Sets the appearance of Spawn to that of Copy Spawn

Function.Name: CreateConversation
Function.Description: Creates a conversation

Function.Name: CreateOptionWindow
Function.Description: Creates an option window

Function.Name: CureByControlEffect
Function.Description: Cures a detrimental effect by its control effect

Function.Name: CureByType
Function.Description: Cures a detrimental effect by type

Function.Name: Despawn
Function.Description: Despawns the Spawn after the given delay

Function.Name: DismissPet
Function.Description: Dismisses the given pet

Function.Name: Emote
Function.Description: Has the spawn do a chat emote, if target is set it will be directed to them, if Player is set it will only be visible to that player

Function.Name: EndAutoMount
Function.Description: Ends the auto mount and allows the player to move again

Function.Name: FaceTarget
Function.Description: Has the Spawn face the Target

Function.Name: Gate
Function.Description: Sends the Player to their bind location

Function.Name: GetAgi
Function.Description: Gets the agility of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetAgiBase
Function.Description: Gets the base agility of the spawn

Function.Name: GetArchetypeName
Function.Description: Gets the base class name of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetCharmedPet
Function.Description: Gets the pet of the provided Entity

Function.Name: GetClass
Function.Description: Gets the ID for the class of the provided Spawn

Function.Name: GetClassName
Function.Description: Gets the class name of the provided Spawn

Function.Name: GetCoinMessage
Function.Description: Gets a message for how many plat/gold/silver/copper are in the total coins

Function.Name: GetCosmeticPet
Function.Description: Gets the cosmetic pet for the provided Entity

Function.Name: GetCurrentZoneSafeLocation
Function.Description: Gets the safe location for the spawns current zone

Function.Name: GetDeityPet
Function.Description: Gets the deity pet for the Spawn

Function.Name: GetDistance
Function.Description: Gets the distance between two spawns, if third parameter is included it will take collison radius into account

Function.Name: GetEncounter
Function.Description: Gets an array of spawns currently in the NPC's encounter

Function.Name: GetEncounterSize
Function.Description: Gets the number of spawns in the NPC's encounter

Function.Name: GetEquippedItemByID
Function.Description: Gets the Item that the player has equipped by the item id

Function.Name: GetEquippedItemBySlot
Function.Description: Gets the Item the Player currently has equipped in the given slot

Function.Name: GetFactionAmount
Function.Description: Gets the Players current standing with the given faction

Function.Name: GetFollowTarget
Function.Description: Gets the spawn that the provided Spawn is following

Function.Name: GetGender
Function.Description: Gets the gender ID for the Spawn

Function.Name: GetGroup
Function.Description: Gets an array of spawns that are in the group of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetHateList
Function.Description: Gets an array of spawns that are in the hate list of the NPC

Function.Name: GetHeading
Function.Description: Gets the current heading of the spawn

Function.Name: GetHP
Function.Description: Gets the current ho of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetInt
Function.Description: Gets the current int of the Entity

Function.Name: GetIntBase
Function.Description: Gets the base int of the Entity

Function.Name: GetItemByID
Function.Description: Gets the Item from the Players inventory

Function.Name: GetItemCount
Function.Description: Gets the stack size of the given Item

Function.Name: GetItemSkillReq
Function.Description: Gets the skill req for the Item

Function.Name: GetItemType
Function.Description: Gets the item type for the Item

Function.Name: GetLevel
Function.Description: Gets the level of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetLootCoin
Function.Description: Gets the amount of coins that the Entity will drop as loot

Function.Name: GetMaxHP
Function.Description: Gets the Spawn's current max hp

Function.Name: GetMaxHPBase
Function.Description: Gets the Spawn's base max hp

Function.Name: GetMaxPower
Function.Description: Gets the Spawn's current max power

Function.Name: GetMaxPowerBase
Function.Description: Get the Spawn's base max power

Function.Name: GetModelType
Function.Description: Get the Spawn's model ID

Function.Name: GetMostHated
Function.Description: Get the spawn that the NPC hates the most

Function.Name: GetMount
Function.Description: Gets the model id of the Entity

Function.Name: GetName
Function.Description: Gets the name of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetOwner
Function.Description: Gets the owner of the given Pet

Function.Name: GetPet
Function.Description: Gets the combat pet of the Entity

Function.Name: GetPlayerHistory
Function.Description: Gets the values for the player for the given event

Function.Name: GetPower
Function.Description: Gets the current power of the spawn

Function.Name: GetQuest
Function.Description: Gets the quest from the Player

Function.Name: GetQuestCompleteCount
Function.Description: Gets the number of times the quest has been completed

Function.Name: GetQuestFlags
Function.Description: Gets the custom flags for the quest

Function.Name: GetQuestStep
Function.Description: Gets the current step of the quest that the Player is working on

Function.Name: GetRace
Function.Description: Gets the race id of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetRaceBaseType
Function.Description: Gets the base race id of the spawn

Function.Name: GetRaceName
Function.Description: Gets the name of the Spawn's race

Function.Name: GetRaceType
Function.Description: Gets the race type of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetRunbackDistance
Function.Description: Gets the distance to the NPC's runback location

Function.Name: GetServerVariable
Function.Description: Gets the value of the given server variable, returns "NULL" if variable is not found

Function.Name: GetSkill
Function.Description: Gets the Entity's skill

Function.Name: GetSkillIDByName
Function.Description: Gets the skill ID by name

Function.Name: GetSkillMaxValue
Function.Description: Gets the skill's max value

Function.Name: GetSkillName
Function.Description: Get the Skill's name

Function.Name: GetSkillValue
Function.Description: Gets the current value of the Skill

Function.Name: GetSpawn
Function.Description: Gets the spawn closest to Spawn with the DB ID

Function.Name: GetSpawnByGroupID
Function.Description: Gets the spawn in the Zone with the provided Group ID

Function.Name: GetSpawnByLocationID
Function.Description: Gets the spawn in the zone with the provided Location ID

Function.Name: GetSpawnGroupID
Function.Description: Gets the spawn group id of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetSpawnID
Function.Description: Gets the database ID of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetSpawnLocationID
Function.Description: Gets the location id of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetSpawnLocationPlacementID
Function.Description: Gets the location placement ID of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetSpeed
Function.Description: Gets the current speed of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetSpellName
Function.Description: Gets the name of the spell, must be used in a spell script

Function.Name: GetSpellTriggerCount
Function.Description: Gets the current trigger count of the spell, must be used in a spell script

Function.Name: GetSta
Function.Description: Gets the current sta for the Entity

Function.Name: GetStaBase
Function.Description: Gets the base sta for the Entity

Function.Name: GetStr
Function.Description: Gets the current str for the Entity

Function.Name: GetStrBase
Function.Description: Gets the base str for the Entity

Function.Name: GetTarget
Function.Description: Gets the current target of the Entity

Function.Name: GetTaskGroupStep
Function.Description: Gets the task group step of the quest for the Player

Function.Name: GetTempVariable
Function.ReturnType: Spawn or Zone or Item or Quest or String
Function.Description: Gets the temp variable for the Spawn, can return different types so you must know what type is stored in the variable

Function.Name: GetTradeskillClass
Function.Description: Gets the tradeskill class ID for the Spawn

Function.Name: GetTradeskillLevel
Function.Description: Gets the tradeskill level of the Spawn

Function.Name: GetVariableValue
Function.Description: Gets the value for the variable

Function.Name: GetWardAmountLeft
Function.Description: Gets the amount left on the ward, must be used in a spell script

Function.Name: GetWis
Function.Description: Gets the current wis of the Entity

Function.Name: GetWisBase
Function.Description: Gets the base wis of the Entity

Function.Name: GetX
Function.Description: Gets the spawns current X coordinate

Function.Name: GetY
Function.Description: Gets the spawns current Y coordinate

Function.Name: GetZ
Function.Description: Gets the spawns current Z coordinate

Function.Name: GetZone
Function.Description: Gets the zone from the Param

Function.Name: GetZoneID
Function.Description: Gets the ID of the Zone

Function.Name: GetZoneName
Function.Description: Gets the name of the Zone

Function.Name: GiveLoot
Function.Description: Opens a loot window between the Entity and the Player with the given items, can provide more then one item id

Function.Name: GiveQuestItem
Function.Description: Has the Quest open a reward window for the Player with the provided Description and Item

Function.Name: GiveQuestReward
Function.Description: Has the Quest give the Player the rewards

Function.Name: HandInCollections
Function.Description: Turns in the Player's completed collection quests

Function.Name: Harvest
Function.Description: Has the Player harvet the Groundspawn

Function.Name: HasCollectionsToHandIn
Function.Description: Checks if the Player has any completed collection quests ready to turn in

Function.Name: HasCompletedQuest
Function.Description: Checks if the Player has completed the quest

Function.Name: HasFreeSlot
Function.Description: Checks if the Player has a free inventory slot

Function.Name: HasGroup
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is in a group, works for both player groups and spawn groups

Function.Name: HasItem
Function.Description: Checks if the Player has the Item

Function.Name: HasItemEquipped
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Player has the item equipped

Function.Name: HasLanguage
Function.Description: Checks to see if the given player has the given language

Function.Name: HasMoved
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity has moved

Function.Name: HasPendingLoot
Function.Description: Checks to see if there is pending loot between the Player and Entity

Function.Name: HasPendingLootItem
Function.Description: Checks to see if the item is in the pending loot between the Player and Entity

Function.Name: HasQuest
Function.Description: Checks to see if the the Player has the quest

Function.Name: HasRecipeBook
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Player has the recipe book for the Recipe ID

Function.Name: HasRecovered
Function.Description: Checks to see if the NPC has recovered from casting

Function.Name: HasSpellEffect
Function.Description: Checks to see if the spell is in the Entity's current effects list

Function.Name: Interrupt
Function.Description: Has the Caster interrupt the casting of the spells targets, or the provided target

Function.Name: IsAlive
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is alive

Function.Name: IsBehind
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is behind the Spawn

Function.Name: IsBindAllowed
Function.Description: Checks to see if bind is allowed for the Player

Function.Name: IsCasting
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is casting

Function.Name: IsEpic
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is epic

Function.Name: IsFlanking
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is flanking the spawn

Function.Name: IsFollowing
Function.Description: Checks to see if the spawn is currently following another spawn

Function.Name: IsGateAllowed
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Player is allowed to gate

Function.Name: IsGroundSpawn
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is a groundspawn

Function.Name: IsHeroic
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is heroic

Function.Name: IsInCombat
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is in combat

Function.Name: IsInvis
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is invisible

Function.Name: IsMezzed
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is mezzed

Function.Name: IsMezzedOrStunned
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is mezzed or stunned

Function.Name: IsNight
Function.Description: Gets if it is currently night time

Function.Name: IsOnAutoMount
Function.Description: Gets if the player is currently on an auto mount

Function.Name: IsPet
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is a pet

Function.Name: IsPlayer
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Spawn is a player

Function.Name: IsStealthed
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is stealthed

Function.Name: IsStunned
Function.Description: Checks to see if the Entity is stunned

Function.Name: KillSpawn
Function.Description: Has the Killer kill the Spawn

Function.Name: KillSpawnByDistance
Function.Description: Has the Spawn kill all spawns, and optionally players, within the given distance

Function.Name: Knockback
Function.Description: Has Target knockback Spawn

Function.Name: LastSpellAttackHit
Function.Description: Checks if this spell last attack hit, must be used in a spell script

Function.Name: ModifyHP
Function.Description: Changes the Spawn's hp by Value

Function.Name: ModifyPower
Function.Description: Changes the Spawn's power by Value

Function.Name: MovementLoopAddLocation
Function.Description: Adds a movement loop location to the spawn with optional delay and call back function

Function.Name: MoveToLocation
Function.Description: Moves the spawn to the location with optional speed and callback function

Function.Name: OfferQuest
Function.Description: Has the NPC offer the quest to the Player

Function.Name: PlayAnimation
Function.Description: Has the Spawn play the animation

Function.Name: PlayFlavor
Function.Description: Plays a voice file for the Spawn, displays text, and does an emote

Function.Name: PlaySound
Function.Description: Plays a sound file in Spawn's zone

Function.Name: PlayVoice
Function.Description: Plays a voice file for the Spawn

Function.Name: ProcDamage
Function.Description: Do proc damage to the target

Function.Name: ProcessMelee
Function.Description: Has the NPC attempt a melee attack on the Entity

Function.Name: ProcessSpell
Function.Description: Has the NPC attempt to cast a spell on the Entity

Function.Name: ProvidesQuest
Function.Description: Sets the Spawn as a quest giver for the quest

Function.Name: QuestIsComplete
Function.Description: Checks to see if the quest is complete and ready for turn in

Function.Name: QuestReturnNPC
Function.Description: Sets the spawn as the quest turn in spawn

Function.Name: SetPlayerHistory
Function.Description: Sets the values for the player for the given event

Function.Name: SetQuestFeatherColor
Function.Description: Sets the color of the quest feather

Function.Name: SetQuestFlags
Function.Description: Sets the custom flags for the quest

Function.Name: SetQuestRepeatable
Function.Description: Sets the quest as repeatable

Function.Name: SetServerVariable
Function.Description: Sets the given server variable to the given value, sets the comment if it is a new variable

Function.Name: StartAutoMount
Function.Description: Starts the player on an auto mount for the provided route

Function.Name: SummonDumbFirePet
Function.Description: Summons a limited combat pet
